title: OMI_physics_shape Cylinder Shape
description: Parameters describing a cylinder physics shape.

height.description: The height of the cylinder shape in meters, the distance between the centers of the two capping discs.

radiusBottom.description: The radius of the bottom of the cylinder (the disc located along -Y) in meters.

radiusTop.description: The radius of the top of the cylinder (the disc located along +Y) in meters.
